comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Born Anne Victorine Savigny (1845-1916), French clairvoyant who published annual predictions about world events (and claimed credit for predicting the Boer War, and the Caillaux affair, also featured in this week's uploads!): fr.wikipedia.org/wiki/Madame_de_Thèbes en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Henriette_Caillaux

comment.author: 66847065@N00
comment._content: Good example of "Out of Bounds" framing technique.

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content:
pennylrichardsca,

Thanks for the info on Mme de Thèbes. What an interesting character! And what a fun connection between her and her claimed predictions in the week's Flickr set!
